meleeweapons.name: Mangler
meleeweapons.content: 200% of Melee Damage deal with axes is also applied to opponent's stamina.

meleeweapons.name: Maniac
meleeweapons.content: Reduce all damage taken by %25 while holding any Axe.

generaloffense.name: Ol'Painless
generaloffense.content: +10% damage with all weapons, traps and explosives.
